title: Assignment statements with r s and t

content.description: Consider the following code segment, which uses the variables r, s, and t.
content.question: r ← 1s ← 2t ← 3r ← ss ← tDISPLAY (r)DISPLAY (s)What is displayed as a result of running the code segment?

skill.text: Skill 4.B: Determine the result of code segments.
